the-referrer.label: The referrer
the-referrer.hint: The person referring their family to come to the UK

immigration-advisor.label: An immigration advisor
immigration-advisor.hint: You must be authorised to act on behalf of the referrer

legal-representative-phone-number.label: Telephone number
legal-representative-phone-number.hint: For international numbers, include the country code.

full-name.label: What is your full name?
full-name.hint: You can copy this from your biometric residence permit card or any letters from the Home Office

provide-telephone-number-number.label: Telephone number
provide-telephone-number-number.hint: For international numbers, include the country code.

partner-phone-number.label: Partner’s telephone number (optional)
partner-phone-number.hint: For international numbers include the country code

partner-date-of-birth.hint: For example, 27 3 1988. If they do not have a date of birth, enter a date that matches any evidence

partner-country.label: What country do they live in?
partner-country.hint: Start to type the country and options will appear. Select 'Unknown' if you do not know

partner-living-situation.label: Partner’s living situation
partner-living-situation.hint: For example, who they are living with, their relationship to who they are living with and how long they have lived there

partner-why-without-partner.label: Why were you evacuated without your partner?
partner-why-without-partner.summary-heading: Why you were evacuated without them

children.legend: Are you referring your children to come to the UK?

child-country.label: What country do they live in?
child-country.hint: Start to type the country and options will appear. Select 'Unknown' if you do not know

child-living-situation.label: Child’s living situation
child-living-situation.hint: For example, who they are living with, their relationship to who they are living with and how long they have lived there

child-why-without-child.label: Why were you evacuated without this child?
child-why-without-child.summary-heading: Why you were evacuated without them

parent.legend: Are you referring a parent to come to the UK?
parent.hint: You can only refer your own parents. You can refer a maximum of 2 parents

parent-phone-number.label: Parent's telephone number (optional)
parent-phone-number.hint: For international numbers include the country code

parent-date-of-birth.hint: For example, 27 3 1988. If they do not have a date of birth, enter a date that matches any evidence

parent-country.label: What country do they live in?
parent-country.hint: Start to type the country and options will appear. Select 'Unknown' if you do not know

parent-evacuated-without-reason.label: Why were you evacuated without this parent?
parent-evacuated-without-reason.summary-heading: Why you were evacuated without them

brother-or-sister.legend: Are you referring a brother or sister to come to the UK?
brother-or-sister.hint: You can only refer brothers or sisters that your parents are responsible for

brother-or-sister-date-of-birth.legend: Brother or sister's date of birth
brother-or-sister-date-of-birth.hint: For example, 27 3 1988. If they do not have a date of birth, enter a date that matches any evidence

brother-or-sister-country.label: What country do they live in?
brother-or-sister-country.hint: Start to type the country and options will appear. Select 'Unknown' if you do not know

brother-or-sister-evacuated-without-reas.label: Why were you evacuated without this brother or sister?
brother-or-sister-evacuated-without-reas.summary-heading: Why you were evacuated without them

additional-family.legend: Are you referring additional family members to come to the UK?

additional-family-date-of-birth.legend: Additional family member's date of birth
additional-family-date-of-birth.hint: For example, 27 3 1988. If they do not have a date of birth, enter a date that matches any evidence

additional-family-relationship.label: Additional family member's relationship to you

additional-family-country.label: What country do they live in?
additional-family-country.hint: Start to type the country and options will appear. Select 'Unknown' if you do not know

additional-family-living-situation.label: Additional family member's living situation
additional-family-living-situation.hint: For example, who they live with and their relationship to the people they live with

additional-family-needs-support.legend: Does this family member need you for support?
additional-family-needs-support.hint: This includes help with housing, money, food and education

additional-family-why-evac-without.label: Why were you evacuated without this family member?
additional-family-why-evac-without.summary-heading: Why were you evacuated without them?

additional-family-why-referring.label: Why are you referring this family member to come to the UK?
additional-family-why-referring.hint: You can only bring additional family to the UK in exceptional circumstances. You must provide evidence later in this form.

has-family-in-uk.legend: Do you have family that live in the UK?

family-member-date-of-birth.hint: For example, 27 3 1985. If they do not have a date of birth,enter a date that matches any evidence

has-family-member-been-evacuated.legend: Was this family member evacuated with you?

evidence-notes-details.label: Evidence notes (optional)
evidence-notes-details.hint: Add any extra information to help us understand your evidence. For example why a date of birth on a document is incorrect, or why you cannot provide evidence.

how-to-send-decision.hint: You will receive your decision quicker by email
